content: यायावर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Frequently going, vagrant, having no fixed abode. --रः {@--1@} A vagrant mendicant, saint; यायावराः पुष्पफलेन चान्ये प्रानर्चुरर्च्या जगदर्चनीयं <ls>Bk. 2. 20</ls>; महाभागस्तस्मिन्नयमजनि यायावरकुले <ls>B. R. 1. 13</ls> (where यायावर is the name of a family). {@--2@} A horse selected for a horse-sacrifice. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the sage जरत्कारु. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a family (to which Rājaśekhara belonged). --रं The life of a vagrant mendicant.
